named-query.name: BC_READ_CONTENT_SPECIFIED
named-query.query: SELECT content FROM org.broadleafcommerce.content.domain.Content content WHERE content.sandbox = :sandbox AND content.contentType = :contentType AND content.activeStartDate < :displayDate AND content.activeEndDate > :displayDate AND content.online = TRUE ORDER BY priority

named-query.name: BC_READ_ALL_CONTENT
named-query.query: SELECT content FROM org.broadleafcommerce.content.domain.Content content ORDER BY id

named-query.name: BC_READ_CONTENT_BY_IDS_AND_SANDBOX
named-query.query: SELECT content FROM org.broadleafcommerce.content.domain.Content content WHERE content.id IN (:idList) AND content.sandbox = :sandbox

named-query.name: BC_READ_CONTENT_BY_IDS_WHERE_SANDBOX_IS_NULL
named-query.query: SELECT content FROM org.broadleafcommerce.content.domain.Content content WHERE content.id IN (:idList) AND content.sandbox is NULL

named-query.name: BC_READ_CONTENT_AWAITING_APPROVAL
named-query.query: SELECT content FROM org.broadleafcommerce.content.domain.Content content WHERE content.sandbox like 'AwaitingApproval%'

named-query.name: BC_READ_CONTENT_BY_SANDBOX
named-query.query: SELECT content FROM org.broadleafcommerce.content.domain.Content content WHERE content.sandbox = :sandbox AND content.online = TRUE ORDER BY priority

named-query.name: BC_READ_CONTENT_BY_LIKE_SANDBOX
named-query.query: SELECT content FROM org.broadleafcommerce.content.domain.Content content WHERE content.sandbox LIKE :sandbox AND content.online = TRUE ORDER BY priority

named-query.name: BC_READ_CONTENT_BY_SANDBOX_AND_CONTENT_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT content FROM org.broadleafcommerce.content.domain.Content content WHERE content.sandbox = :sandbox AND content.contentType = :contentType AND content.online = TRUE ORDER BY priority

named-query.name: BC_READ_CONTENT_BY_NULL_SANDBOX_AND_CONTENT_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT content FROM org.broadleafcommerce.content.domain.Content content WHERE content.sandbox is null AND content.contentType = :contentType AND content.online = TRUE ORDER BY priority

named-query.name: BC_READ_STAGED_CONTENT
named-query.query: SELECT content FROM org.broadleafcommerce.content.domain.Content content WHERE content.sandbox is NULL ORDER BY priority
